Title: Relates to declaring a climate emergency and placing a ban on new fossil fuel infrastructure
Summary: Declares a climate emergency and places a ban on fossil fuel infrastructure projects but shall not apply to repair or maintenance of existing infrastructure.
LawCode: Add ยง1-0103, Art 23 Title 29 ยง23-2901, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to declaring a climate emergency and placing a ban on new fossil fuel infrastructure
